sentence: This will enable easier integration of new machine learning tools.
author: broadinstitute

sentence: rg/hc/en-us/articles/10064202674971-Introducing-NVIDIA-s-NVScoreVariants-a-new-deep-learning-tool-for-filtering-variants) has more of the story from when we first made the tool available for testing.
author: broadinstitute

sentence: * Huge simplication of genotyping likelihoods calculations -- no change in output (#6351)
author: broadinstitute

sentence: * Test for presence of ack result message and simplify `ProcessControllerAckResult` API (#7816)
author: broadinstitute

sentence: * Updated the GATK stats script to be more universally usable (#7759)
author: broadinstitute

sentence: * Removed undocumented mid-p correction to p-values in exact test of Hardy-Weinberg equilibrium and updated corresponding tests.
author: broadinstitute

sentence: * Started laying the groundwork in `Mutect2` for `Mutect3`, which will be more machine learning focused
author: broadinstitute

sentence: * Training data mode collects data on variant- and artifact-supporting read sets for fitting a deep learning filtering model
author: broadinstitute

sentence: impleBaseToBaseIndex()` methods more robust to handle all possible byte values (#7010)
author: broadinstitute

sentence: * The GATK docker image can now be built with a simple `docker build .
author: broadinstitute

sentence: * *We encourage you to try this out and give us feedback!
author: broadinstitute

sentence: * Removed the beta label from many simple Spark tools (#5991)
author: broadinstitute

sentence: * Added a simple TSV/CSV/XSV writer with cloud write support as an alternative to TableWriter (#5930)
author: broadinstitute

sentence: * The new somatic clustering model learns tumors' allele fraction spectra and overall SNV and indel mutation rates in order to improve filtering.
author: broadinstitute

sentence: * A machine learning (xgBoost) based classifier for SV evidence improves runtime and increases accuracy by determining which regions should be fed into the local assembly workflow.
author: broadinstitute

sentence: * `CompareIntervalLists`: simple new tool to compare interval lists (#3702)
author: broadinstitute

sentence: * `CountBasesInReference`: simple new tool to count bases in a reference file (#5549)
author: broadinstitute

sentence: This simple tool will merge genomic regions (specified in a tsv) when given annotations (columns) contain exact values in neighboring segments and the segments are within a specified maximum genomic distance.
author: broadinstitute

sentence: * bring MAX_ALIGN_LENGTH and MAPPING_QUALITIES annotations from CPX variants to re-interpreted simple variants
author: broadinstitute

sentence: * Added a new experimental tool named `CpxVariantReInterprepterSpark` to extract barebone-annotated simple variants from an GATK-SV discovery pipeline produced VCF containing complex variants (#4602)
author: broadinstitute

sentence: *  clear diffuse high frequency kmers (#3604)
author: broadinstitute

sentence: *  PathSeq adapter trimming and simple repeat masking (#3354)
author: broadinstitute
